item.title: Create two videos with basic visuals to match a voiceover with a total running time of 11 minutes - Upwork
item.description:
I have attached 2 recorded voiceovers with a total time of 11 minutes and 2 Word documents with the script and an explanation of the visuals that should be in each video. It is words on the screen with stock images. There are also three example screenshots that I have seen in other videos that show how I would want these two videos to look. The overall ask is for the videos to be basic, professional and clean. It must be 16:9 ratio and 1080p.
Ignore the budget and make me an offer for how much it will cost you to produce the two videos. Please quote the word 'indemnity' as the very first word of your reply so I know you read the description.

Budget: $5
Posted On: June 23, 2024 09:50 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production
Skills: Video Production
Country: United Kingdom

item.title: TikTok Video Edits - Upwork
item.description:
Video Editor & Voiceover Specialist for Shilajit Brand TikTok Videos

Description:

Hello!

I am looking for a talented and creative video editor and voiceover specialist to help produce high-quality TikTok videos for my Shilajit brand. If you are familiar with creating engaging content like @nurojit on TikTok, this job is perfect for you!

Project Overview:

I will film the raw footage for the videos, and I need someone who can:

Perform voiceovers or use AI voiceover tools
Edit the footage to create polished and engaging videos
Add text overlays, animations, and effects
Optimize videos for TikTok (9:16 aspect ratio)
Ensure a consistent and professional style across all videos
Responsibilities:

Voiceover:
Record professional voiceovers or utilize AI voiceover tools to match the video’s tone and style.
Video Editing:
Edit the provided footage to create dynamic and engaging videos.
Add text overlays, animations, and effects to enhance visual appeal.
Sync voiceover with video clips for a seamless experience.
Optimization:
Ensure videos are optimized for TikTok format (9:16 aspect ratio).
Add appropriate background music and sound effects.
Consistency:
Maintain a consistent brand voice and style across all videos.
Incorporate feedback and make revisions as needed.
Requirements:

Proven experience in video editing and voiceover work.
Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, etc.).
Experience with voiceover recording or AI voiceover tools.
Strong understanding of TikTok trends and video optimization.
Creative mindset and attention to detail.
Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
Preferred Qualifications:

Experience creating content for health and wellness brands.
Familiarity with Shilajit and its benefits.
Strong portfolio showcasing previous TikTok or social media video work.
Application Process:

If you are interested in this opportunity, please submit the following:

A brief introduction about yourself and your experience.
Links to your portfolio or examples of previous work.
Your proposed rate for this project.
Any relevant experience with health and wellness brands.
I look forward to collaborating with a talented professional who can help bring my Shilajit brand to life on TikTok!

Thank you!



Hourly Range: $6.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 23, 2024 09:42 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Music Video, Education, Video Intro & Outro
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Music Video, Education, Video Intro & Outro
Country: Denmark
click to apply

item.title: Utube Video or Social Media Pro, to Help Others, Use Knowledge to make Video Viral, Promote Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Seeking an experienced UTuber, and/or experience with other video social marketing, for marketing an excellent and humorous video, who can start promptly to help promote and broadcast it, regarding caring for others and animals. Want to hire Utubers who have their own channel of thousands, and who know how to launch a Utube video for quantities of counted views, monetization, (+social media, etc.), and/or talk to someone who knows how to place the video with firm(s) that have a channel for prompt connecting of the video to others. You will work on your own remotely, and share ideas with a team online, and can start now.

The video is entertaining, and we need to verbally describe some thoughts, so you must have good communication in English, and be on top of deadlines and moving to the next steps quickly.  The video is edited and if you have editing skills and knowledge of effects, to further enhance it, that is fine.
This project starts with this video and may lead to your involvement on future projects with lots of resources.  We look forward to speaking with you asap. Thank you.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$35.00
Posted On: June 23, 2024 09:37 UTC
Category: Social Media Strategy
Skills:Community Engagement, Social Media Marketing, YouTube Marketing, Marketing Strategy, Instagram, Facebook
Skills: Community Engagement, Social Media Marketing, YouTube Marketing, Marketing Strategy, Instagram, Facebook
Country: United States

item.title: Video editor needed for TikTok/YouTube short videos of people appealing for help in Gaza - Upwork
item.description:
Hello Everyone

GetMoreDonations is a performance based agency based in Boca Raton Florida that specializes in helping out non profit organizations with fundraising for charities. Our goal is to help as many people as possible that are in dire need of our help.

Just to give you an idea, we have helped tens of thousands of families in places such as Yemen, Syria, and even assisted the homeless in NYC.

We are looking for a solid video editor that can help us make emotional stories by editing found-footage and news clips.

Here is an example of a video we found:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OSdddzjkzpM

This is how the video should be edited after (Here is an example of how we edited it):

https://youtu.be/ceRU9EMknsU

Basically when you edit these videos they need to show the most emotional part of the refugees story and then get people to donate as quickly as possible.

You must have experience editing videos. Facebook and Youtube ads experience a big plus. You must be competent and able to retell emotional stories by editing found-footage and news clips. You must speak good/fluent english for proper communication, know terms such as "L Cut" , and be able to complete projects within specified deadlines.  When applying please send examples of what videos you have edited in the past.

If you meet our requirements, then this will be for a full time, long term position.  With your help, we can help expand our goal to help 1,000,000 people in less than a year.

To learn more about us, please visit getmoredonations.com

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 23, 2024 09:35 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Audio Editing, Explainer Video
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Audio Editing, Explainer Video
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Experienced Video Editor for Hollywood/Celebrity Niche - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced video editor with a passion for the Hollywood/celebrity niche. As a video editor, you will be responsible for editing and producing high-quality videos that showcase the glamour and excitement of the entertainment industry. Your main tasks will include selecting and editing footage, adding special effects and transitions, and ensuring the final product meets our clients' specifications. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of storytelling and be able to work independently to meet tight deadlines. Experience with video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro is required.

Skills needed:
- Video editing
- Storytelling
- Attention to detail
- Time management
- Knowledge of video editing software

Description
Video Duration 15-20 minutes


Join our team and showcase your editing skills in the Hollywood/celebrity niche!

Budget: $15
Posted On: June 23, 2024 09:24 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: India
click to apply
